description.0: An ancient jade pendant that gleams like clear water. It seems to have been used in ancient ceremonies.

0.0: When not on the field for more than 5s, Max HP will be increased by <cryo>32%</cryo> and Elemental Mastery will be increased by <cryo>40</cryo>. These effects will be canceled after the wielder has been on the field for 10s.

1.0: When not on the field for more than 5s, Max HP will be increased by <cryo>40%</cryo> and Elemental Mastery will be increased by <cryo>50</cryo>. These effects will be canceled after the wielder has been on the field for 10s.
